newsitem.title: USA: CME cattle and pork complex pre-opening calls.
newsitem.headline: CME cattle and pork complex pre-opening calls.

text.p: CME cattle and pork complex pre-opening calls as of 0800 CDT, analysts said.
LIVE CATTLE - Up 0.200 to off 0.100 cent. Market factors strong but light trade seen ahead of cattle-on-feed report.
FEEDER CATTLE - Up 0.200 to off 0.100 cent. Likely follow lead of live cattle. Easier corn call supportive.
LIVE HOGS - Off 0.100 to 0.300 cent. Cash markets continue weak but market near technical support level.
PORK BELLIES - Off 2.000 cent limit to steady. August seen down limit on weak cash. Backs held technical support.
